system.description:
You have traveled far from the settled world and found in the quiet of the wilds a connection to ancient supernatural power. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Dexterity or Wisdom score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You can change your witch spellcasting ability to Wisdom if you desire. Once made, this choice is permanent.
  • Your ranger levels count as witch levels for the purpose of your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.dice2o2bv8tsynlt]{Witch's Familiar} feature.
  • Add your choice of one of the following schools to the witch list for you: beast, plants, or weaponry.
  • Half your witch levels count as ranger levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.n83irh1dygryy7q8]{Stride and Seek} feature.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in ranger, 3 levels in witch
